==*OPERATEURS*==

  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=google OR yahoo google OR yahoo]* boolean...
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=%2Bwww.cplus%2Bfr +www.cplus+fr]* les pages d'un site ou liées à ce site
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=fire.fox fire.fox]* retournera les documents contenant les phrases : fire fox, fireAfox, fire1fox, fire-fox, etc...
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=~inexpensive ~inexpensive]* synonymes : matches &quot;inexpensive&quot;, &quot;cheap&quot;, &quot;affordable&quot;, and &quot;low cost&quot;
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=%2Bla+femme +la femme]* ne pas ignorer le "mot vide" "la" (c++) 
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=%2BFRANÇAIS +FRANÇAIS]* tenir compte des accents ou autres signes diacritiques
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=salsa+–dance salsa –dance]* ignorer les résultat contenants "dance"
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=Francis+*+Coppola Francis * Coppola]* followed by one or more words
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=%22how+to+change+oil%22 "how to change oil"]* obviously
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=russian%20revolution%201800..2000 russian revolution 1800..2000]* find the year the Russian Revolution took place
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=recumbent%20bicycle%20$250..$1000 recumbent bicycle $250..$1000]* searching in the price range $250 to $1000

==*REQUETES SPECIFIQUES*==

  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=help%20site:google.com help site:google.com]* recherche une page dans un site en particulier
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=weather:paris+france weather:paris france]* il fait beau ?
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=spell:googlue spell:googlue]* orthographe...
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=define:google define:google]* will provide a definition of the words you enter after
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=cache:www.google.com web cache:www.google.com web]* will show the cached content with the word "web" highlighted 
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=link:www.google.com link:www.google.com]* will list webpages that have links pointing to the Google homepage
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=help+site:www.google.com help site:www.google.com]* will find pages about help within www.google.com
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=related:www.google.com related:www.google.com]* will list web pages that are similar to the Google homepage
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=info:www.google.com info:www.google.com]* will list google  infos
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=stocks:google stocks:google]* finance...
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=filetype:pdf%20google filetype:pdf google]* limiter aux extensions (ou bien "ext:jpg")
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=allintitle: google search allintitle: google search]* will return only documents that have both "google" and "search" in the title
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=intitle:index.of%20+%20%22mp3%22%20+%20%22noir%20desir%22%20-htm%20-html%20-php%20-asp intitle:index.of + "mp3" + "noir desir" -htm -html -php -asp]* liste de fichiers sans page d'index...		
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=allinurl:%20google%20search allinurl: google search]* will return only documents that have both "google" and "search" in the url 
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=inurl:google%20search inurl:google search]* will return documents that mention the word "google" in their url, and mention the word "search" anywhere in the document
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=allinanchor:useful%20parenting%20sites allinanchor:useful parenting sites]* search for pages that are called "useful parenting sites" by others
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=restaurant%20paris%20inanchor:enfant restaurant paris inanchor:enfant]* search for pages on Portland restaurants for which links to the page say they are "kid friendly"
  * *[http://www.google.fr/search?hl=fr&q=n%C2%B01%20rue%20marue%20maville n°1 rue marue maville]* map...
